meanings.definition: The part of a plant stem between two nodes.
meanings.sent1: The internodes of the plant stem help in transporting water and nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The gardener measured the internodes of the stem to track its growth.
meanings.sent3: The internodes of the stem were having a party, chatting about the nodes.
meanings.sent4: The internodes stood tall like bridges connecting the nodes of the stem.
meanings.sent5: The internodes looked like little highways running along the stem.

meanings.definition: A segment of a stem between two nodes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully examined the internodes of the stem for any signs of disease.
meanings.sent2: The internodes on the plant were shorter this season due to lack of sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The internodes of the stem were playing hide and seek with the nodes.
meanings.sent4: The internodes acted as checkpoints along the stem's journey.
meanings.sent5: The internodes were like small rooms between the nodes, each with its own story.
